text.レース中間からロングスパートをかけて\\n速度がわずかに上がる: <size=22>Slightly increase speed by running \na long spurt from the middle of the race\n</size>
text.残り200mを切って前の方にいると\\n競り合いに強くなり速度が少し上がる: <size=22>Increase speed and power lightly when close to \nthe lead in last 200m\n</size>
text.レース後半に前の方で\\n1番になる力をわずかに発揮する: <size=22>Be in the lead during the 2nd half of the race \nto show off your ability to take 1st place\n</size>
text.最終直線で後ろの方から追い抜くと\\n末脚を使って速度が少し上がる: <size=22>Lightly increase speed when passing in the back \nin Final Leg straight.\n</size>
text.最終直線で余力を持って前にいると\\nわずかに優位を保ちやすくなる: <size=22>Slightly easier to keep advantage if you have \nenough strength in the Final Leg straight\n</size>
text.最終コーナーで中団以降から追い抜くと\\n女帝たる走りで速度が少し上がる:
<size=22>When passing from the midfield or further down 
in the last corner, slightly increase your speed 
with steps befitting an empress
</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に前の方で競り合うと\\n直線でわずかに抜け出しやすくなる:
<size=22>When battling near the front from the final 
corner on, breaking away on the straight becomes 
a little easier
</size>
text.レース終盤のコーナーで前の位置に\\nつこうとして加速力が少し上がる:
<size=22>Gain a slight increase in acceleration 
as you attempt to gain positions during 
the last corner of the race
</size>
text.レース後半のコーナーで控えていると\\n持久力が少し回復し\\nさらに少しの間速:
<size=22>When holding steady in a corner during the 
race's second half, recover a bit of energy, and 
increase speed a little bit for a short while
</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に競り合っていると\\n最終直線で前方にいる時\\n強い気持ちが:
<size=22>When battling from the final corner on, slightly 
increase speed in line with your strong spirit 
when near the front on the final straight
</size>
text.レース後半に前の方で競り合うとバク\\nシン力（？）を発揮、速度が少し上がる:
<size=22>While fighting for the lead during the second 
part of the race, lightly increase your speed 
through displaying your Bakushin power
</size>
text.レース中盤で好位置にいる時に\\n持久力が回復する: <size=22>Be in good position during Middle \nLeg to recover endurance\n</size>
text.最終コーナーで後ろの方にいると近くの\\nウマ娘を見て持久力を少し回復する:
<size=22>Being at the back during the last corner, 
lightly restores your endurance when you see 
another horse girl
</size>
text.レース終盤に前方が詰まると\\nお告げの力で少し道を切り開く:
<size=22>If during the Last Leg of the race your 
way to the front of the field is blocked, 
your power of divination will make it lightly 
easier to spot an opening
</size>
text.レース終盤で3番手の時に負けそうに\\nなると闘志に火が付き速度が少し上がる:
<size=22>When you're in 3rd place at the end of the race 
and about to lose, you gain a little bit more 
fighting spirit and lightly increase your speed
</size>
text.レースを冷静に運ぶことができると\\n残り200mで実力発揮、速度が上がる:
<size=22>If you can get calm and composed through the 
race, you will be able to showcase your ability 
and increase your speed for the last 200m
</size>
text.レース中間付近で中団にいるとき\\n気合を入れ直して持久力を少し回復し\\nさら:
<size=22>When in the middle of the pack around half 
distance, pick yourself up by recovering a bit 
of energy and increase speed slightly
</size>
text.レース終盤に前の方で相手を抜くと\\n勢いに乗って速度が上がり\\nさらに加速力:
<size=22>Overtake the opponent in front of you 
during the Last Leg of the race to gain 
momentum and increase speed, as well as 
slightly increase acceleration
</size>
text.レース後半に差を付けて先頭にいると\\nさらなる脚を使って、速度を上げる:
<size=22>Be in the lead with a gap behind you during the 
latter race half to increase your speed, making 
even more use of your legs
</size>
text.最終直線で前と差が詰まると\\n華麗な脚取りで速度がすごく上がる:
<size=22>Close down the leader on the final straight to 
greatly increase your speed even further through 
your brilliant leg work
</size>
text.最終コーナー以降で前の方にいると\\nギアを変えて加速力が上がる: <size=22>Increase acceleration from final corner onward \nby changing gears when in the front group\n</size>
text.最終直線で前の方で少し抜け出ていると\\n輝きを増し速度がすごく上がる:
<size=22>If you're in front at the final straight 
and manage to break out a little, 
increase speed greatly
</size>
text.残り200m地点で前の方にいると\\n道を開いてすごく抜け出しやすくなる:
<size=22>Be close to the lead during the last 200m to 
make it easier to break through and find a way 
through the field
</size>
text.レース中間からロングスパートをかけて\\n速度が少しずつ上がる: <size=22>Gradually increase speed during \nthe long spurt in Middle Leg\n</size>
text.残り200mを切って前の方にいると\\n競り合いに強くなり速度が上がる: <size=22>Increase speed and power when close \nto the lead in last 200m\n</size>
text.レース後半に前の方で\\n1番になる力を発揮する: <size=22>Display your power to take the lead when near \nthe front during the latter half of the race\n</size>
text.最終直線が迫ったとき好位置にいると\\n弾みを付けて加速力が上がる:
<size=22>Be in a good position when nearing 
the final straight to gain momentum 
and increase your acceleration
</size>
text.最終直線で後ろの方から追い抜くと\\n末脚を使って速度が上がる: <size=22>Increase speed when passing in \nthe back in Final Leg straight\n</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に後ろの方から\\n外を回って追い抜いていると\\n最終直線で速:
<size=22>Gain speed on the last straight when 
passing around the outside in the 
back from the final corner on
</size>
text.最終コーナーで前の方にいると\\n抜かせない覚悟を決めて速度が上がる:
<size=22>Be close to the lead in the final 
corner to gain speed as you resolve 
yourself to not be overtaken
</size>
text.最終直線で余力を持って前にいると\\nより優位を保ちやすくなる: <size=22>Easier to keep a good position in last straight \nwith spare energy\n</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に前の方で\\n前または後ろのウマ娘と距離が近いと\\n王たる輝:
<size=22>When near the front from the last corner on and 
close to the horsegirl in front or behind, 
increase speed through your kingly radiance
</size>
text.最終コーナー以降で外から追い抜くと\\n怪物的な力で、速度を上げる\\n中盤競り:
<size=22>Increase speed with monstrous power from final 
corner onward when passing from outside, more so 
when you were battling in the Mid Leg
</size>
text.レース終盤に3回追い抜くと\\n最終直線で速度がすごく上がる:
<size=22>During the Last Leg of the race make three 
overtakes to strongly increase your speed on the 
final straight
</size>
text.最終コーナーで中団以降から追い抜くと\\n女帝たる走りで速度が上がる:
<size=22>When passing from the midfield or further down 
in the last corner, increase your speed with 
steps befitting an empress
</size>
text.レース終盤に2回追い抜くと間近で拝む\\nウマ娘ちゃんのあまりの尊さに思わず\\:
<size=22>When overtaking twice in the Last 
Leg, inadvertently increase speed 
and take a better line from seeing 
the precious horsegirls up close
</size>
text.レース終盤のコーナーで先頭にいると\\nこれ幸いと加速力を上げる: <size=22>On last corner, gain acceleration when in the \nfirst position\n</size>
text.レース後半の直線で好位置にいる\\nまたは中団から前を狙うと\\n稲妻の如く駆け:
<size=22>Bolt like lightning on a straight in the latter 
half when in a good position or moving up from 
the middle of the pack
</size>
text.レース後半に好位置で競り合うと\\n走ることに心を躍らせて\\n速度を上げる:
<size=22>A heart-throbbing competition for 
a good position in the race's latter 
half increases your speed
</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に前の方で追い抜くと\\n勝利の方程式を導き、速度を上げる: <size=22>Increase speed when near the front and passing \nfrom the last corner on\n</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に前の方で競り合うと\\n直線で抜け出しやすくなる:
<size=22>After battling near the front from the last 
corner on, it becomes easier to break away 
during the final straight
</size>
text.レース後半に中団から\\n『お友達』を追って速度を少しずつ上げ\\n前方のウマ娘:
<size=22>In the race's second half, chase "friends" from 
the middle of the pack, gradually increasing 
speed and slightly slowing girls ahead.
</size>
text.最終直線までみずから崩れることなく\\n前の方にいると速度が上がる: <size=22>Make no mistakes and be in the front at the \nfinal straight to increase your speed\n</size>
text.レース終盤のコーナーで前の位置に\\nつこうとして加速力が上がる: <size=22>Increase acceleration as you attempt to overtake \nin last corner\n</size>
text.レース中間に好位置で少し疲れてくると\\n気合を入れ直して大きく前へ踏み込む:
<size=22>If you get a little tired while being in a good 
position in the middle of the race, your speed 
and acceleration increase
</size>
text.残り300mを切って先頭もしくは\\n前の方で先頭のウマ娘との距離が近いと\\n: <size=22>Increase speed when leading or close to \nthe leading horsegirl with 300m to go\n</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に追い抜いて\\n先団についていると最終直線で\\n強い意志を持:
<size=22>Break away with the leading group 
from the last corner on to steel your 
will and increase your speed
</size>
text.残り300m付近で前の方だと速度を少し\\n上げる、ちょうど坂を上りきったところ:
<size=22>Increase speed slightly when in the leading 
places with around 300m to go, highly so after 
just climbing a hill
</size>
text.レース後半のコーナーで控えていると\\n持久力を回復し\\nさらに少しの間速度を:
<size=22>When holding steady in a corner during the 
race's second half, recover energy, and slightly 
increase speed for a little while
</size>
text.最終直線で先頭から離されていると\\n星に導かれるように速度が上がる\\n最後方:
<size=22>When far from the front on the final straight, 
increase speed as if guided by the stars. 
Greatly so if all the way near the back
</size>
text.レース前半、中団以降に控え続けると\\n追い比べをしたとき、江戸っ子の底力を\\:
<size=22>Unleash your latent Edoite strength to greatly 
increase speed when in Showdown if you've 
restrained yourself in the mid pack or further 
back during the first race half.
</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に競り合っていると\\n最終直線で前方にいる時\\n強い気持ちが:
<size=22>When battling from the final corner on, increase 
speed in line with your strong spirit when near 
the front on the final straight
</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に中団の内ラチ側にい\\nると勝利への道筋を見出して最終直線で\:
<size=22>Increase speed and improve your course-taking 
ability by calculating your path to victory when 
close to the inner railing in the midfield from 
the last corner onwards.
</size>
text.最終直線まで冷静に自身の計画通り\\n走行出来れば、先頭目がけて鋭い脚で\\n速: <size=22>If you manage to keep your composure until the \nfinal straight, your speed will increase\n</size>
text.レース中間付近で好位置にいる時に\\n追い抜くと勢いづき進出を開始する: <size=22>Gain momentum while in a good position when \npassing someone in the Middle Leg\n</size>
text.最終直線を走行中に競り合うと\\n可憐にぶっ飛ばして速度を上げる: <size=22>When battling on the last straight, increase \nspeed with a graceful drive\n</size>
text.レース後半に中団から仕掛け始める時に\\n持てるパフォーマンスを発揮して\\n加:
<size=22>In the race's second half, increase 
acceleration if you start overtaking 
from the middle of the pack
</size>
text.レース後半に前の方で競り合うと\\nバクシン力（？）を発揮、速度が上がる: <size=22>During the later half of the race, your speed \nincreases when competing for the lead\n</size>
text.残り200ｍ地点で先頭ではないとき\\n先頭から4バ身以内だと速度を上げる\\n:
<size=22>Increase speed when not leading and within 
4 lengths from the lead with 200m to go. 
Increase greatly when within 2 lengths
</size>
text.最終コーナー突入時まで冷静に後方で\\n控えていると残り300m地点でスピード\:
<size=22>Cast Haste to continually increase speed at 300m 
to go if you've restrained yourself calmly in 
the back until the final corner rush
</size>
text.レース中盤で好位置にいる時に\\n持久力がすごく回復する: <size=22>Recover a large amount of energy when in a good \nposition during the Middle Leg\n</size>
text.レース中盤の直線で前の方にいるとき\\n後ろのウマ娘と距離が近いと\\n譲らない:
<size=22>When near the front on a Mid Leg straight with a 
horsegirl close behind, your unyielding spirit 
becomes your power
</size>
text.最終直線を走行中に好位置で\\n追い抜くまたは詰め寄られると\\nテンションを上:
<size=22>If you overtake or are about to be overtaken on 
the final straight while in a good position, 
your speed will increase
</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に追い抜こうとすると\\n残り400ｍ以降に好位置で速度が上がる:
<size=22>Increase speed when in a good position 
with 400m to go after attempting an overtake 
in or after the final corner. Further increased 
speed when popularity is low.
</size>
text.最終コーナー以降で中団から\\n前へ出る時、切れ味が増し速度が上がる:
<size=22>From the last corner on, when coming up from the 
midfield or lower, your focus sharpens to 
increase speed
</size>
text.レース中盤のコーナーで競り合っていた\\n場合、終盤かつ最終コーナー半ば以降に\:
<size=22>Increase acceleration when in a good position 
from the 2nd half of a Final Leg Corner on, and 
having battled in a Mid Leg Corner
</size>
text.最終コーナーで後ろの方にいると近くの\\nウマ娘を見て持久力を回復する: <size=22>When in the back in last corner, restore your \nendurance when you see another horse girl\n</size>
text.終盤最終コーナー以降に後方から迫ると\\n短い間加速力がちょっと上がり\\n追い:
<size=22>Slightly increase acceleration for a short time, 
increasing strength and duration up to 3 times 
with each overtake, when closing in from 
the rear at or after the last corner in Final Leg.
</size>
text.レース終盤に前方が詰まると\\nお告げの力で道を切り開く: <size=22>When the front is packed during the Last Leg of \nthe race, the oracle's power will open a path\n</size>
text.レース終盤のコーナーで\\n中団以降のポジションから追い抜くと\\nあきらめない:
<size=22>During the Last Leg, when overtaking 
from outside the front of the pack during 
a corner, display your unyielding spirit 
to move further forwards
</size>
text.落ち着いたまま、中盤の仕掛けどころの\\nまたは終盤の勝負どころのコーナーを\\:
<size=22>Having kept your calm in the middle of the pack, 
your high spirits will increase acceleration 
during the decisive Middle or Final Leg corner
</size>
text.レース終盤で3番手の時に負けそうにな\\nると秘めた闘志に火が付き速度が上がる: <size=22>When you're in 3rd place at the end of the race \nand about to lose, your speed increases\n</size>
text.レースを冷静に運ぶことができると残り\\n200mで実力発揮、速度がすごく上がる: <size=22>After proceeding through the race calmly, your \nspeed drastically increases during the last 200m\n</size>
text.レース中間付近で中団にいるとき\\n気合を入れ直して持久力を回復し\\nさらに速:
<size=22>When in the middle of the pack around half 
distance, pick yourself up by recovering energy 
and increase speed slightly
</size>
text.スタート後からレース後半まで前の方を\\nキープすると気分を爆アゲして持久力を\:
<size=22>A rush of emotions recover energy and gradually 
increase speed when staying in the front group 
for the entire first half of the race
</size>
text.最終直線に入ったとき好位置につけて\\nいると強い意志で速度が上がる\\n先頭が:
<size=22>Increase speed through strong determination when 
entering the final straight in a good position, 
greatly so when near the lead
</size>
text.前方にいるとき、レース後半の第3\\nコーナーで速度を少し上げる、または\\n終:
<size=22>Increase speed slightly when in the lead group 
in the third corner after half distance, or push 
strongly forwards on the track's back straight 
during the Final Leg
</size>
text.残り300mを切って好位置にいるとき\\n前のウマ娘との距離が近いと\\n強い想:
<size=22>When in a good position close to the girl ahead 
with less than 300m to go, your tempestuous 
spirit blossoms into speed
</size>
text.最終直線で後ろのウマ娘と距離が近いと\\nこの瞬間に懸け持久力をわずかに使い\\:
<size=22>When the horsegirl behind is close on the 
final straight, put your all in this moment 
and highly increase your speed for a while 
at the cost of some stamina
</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に追い抜いていた場合\\n残り300mを切って先団にいるとき\\:
<size=22>Increase speed through fiery fighting spirit 
when in the leading group with 300m to go, 
having made a pass from the Final Corner on
</size>
text.レース後半に中団から残り持久力に\\n応じたロングスパートをかけて\\n速度をわ:
<size=22>Start a long spurt based on remaining energy 
from the midfield in the race's latter half, 
slightly and continuously increasing speed
</size>
text.レース前半で控え、最終コーナー後半に\\n前の方だと長時間加速力をちょっと上げ\:
<size=22>Increase acceleration for an extended duration 
when near the front in the latter half of the 
final corner after having sat back a little during 
the first half of the race. 
Stronger effect when in 2nd place
</size>
text.残り400mを切って前の方で\\n詰め寄られるとファンの心に残る走りで\\n抜け:
<size=22>Break away more easily with a dash that will 
remain in your fan's memories when chased 
down in or near the lead with 400m to go
</size>
text.終盤が迫ったときどこかで速度を少し\\n上げ、さらに能力を引き出すスキルの\\n:
<size=22>Increase speed slightly at some point when 
nearing Final Leg, additionally increase speed 
and acceleration based on the number of 
activated stat-boost skills
</size>
text.残り300m地点で前の方にいると速度を\\n少し上げる、ダートレースで先頭の\\:
<size=22>Increase speed slightly when near the front 
at 300m to the line. Push a little further ahead 
when close to the leader on dirt
</size>
text.中盤で2回スキルを使うと\\nよりリラックスして持久力が回復する: <size=22>Restore endurance if you activate two skills in \nthe middle part of the race\n</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に前の方で\\n追いすがっていると最終直線を走行中\\n不屈の闘:
<size=22>When chasing someone near the front 
from the last corner on, greatly increase 
speed on the last straight
</size>
text.スキルで持久力を回復すると\\nレース後半で前のほうにいる時に\\nレッツラゴー: <size=22>In the race's second half, increase speed when \nrecovering endurance with skills while in front\n</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に先団で追い抜くと\\n煌めくような華麗な動きを披露し\\n少し:
<size=22>Showcase your graceful motions to greatly 
increase speed for a short while when overtaking 
in the midfield from the final corner on
</size>
text.スキルで持久力を3回以上回復すると\\nレース後半で勝利に向かい\\n呼吸を整え: <size=22>After recovering HP with skills thrice, recover \nyour breath and break strongly for victory\n</size>
text.レース後半どっかで速度をわずかに上げ\\nついでに使えそうなレアスキルを2つ\\:
<size=22>Activate 2 useful-looking rare skills 
somewhere in the second half of the 
race, no questions asked.
</size>
text.残り200m地点で前の方にいると速度を\\n上げる、さらに先頭のウマ娘と近い場合:
<size=22>Increase speed when near the lead with 
200m to go, additionally pushing further 
forwards with a powerful run when close 
to the leading horsegirl.
</size>
text.中盤に後ろの方で順位を下げた時に\\n優しい光で持久力をすごく回復する:
<size=22>When passed in the back of the pack 
during Middle Leg, a gentle glow 
greatly recovers stamina
</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に前めで力が尽きかけ\\n詰め寄られると速度を上げ続ける:
<size=22>Continuously increase speed in or after the last 
corner when being pressed in the lead group and 
stamina is running out
</size>
text.最終コーナーで中団から前を狙う時\\n魂を燃え滾らせて加速力を上げる: <size=22>On last corner, gain acceleration when aiming \nfor the lead from the middle pack\n</size>
text.残り400m地点で先団だと少しの間\\n速度を上げる、それまでに7回スキルを\\: <size=22>Increase speed when heading the mid pack a \nlittle, significantly so if you've used 7 skills\n</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に先団で\\n詰め寄られると闘志を燃やして\\n速度を上げる: <size=22>If you're about to be overtaken at the front \nafter the final corner, your speed will increase\n</size>
text.レース中盤で前の方から\\n仕掛け始める時に速度が上がる: <size=22>Increase speed in Middle Leg when overtaking \nsomeone close to lead\n</size>
text.中盤のコーナーで中団以降にいるとき\\n近くにウマ娘ちゃんが3人以上いると\\n:
<size=22>Increase speed by the power of moe when 
near at least 3 horsecuties in the midfield or 
further back during a middle leg corner
</size>
text.終盤の直線で前の方にいると意気揚々と\\n速度を上げる、そこが向正面の場合\\n:
<size=22>Triumphantly increase speed when leading on a 
Final Leg straight, also increase acceleration 
slightly when on the back straight of the track
</size>
text.レース中盤にスキルを2つ発動すると\\n速度を少し上げ続ける、効果中スキルを\\:
<size=22>Continually increase speed slightly when 
activating 2 skills in the middle leg. Effect 
increases up to 2 times when activating 
more skills in the duration
</size>
text.終盤最終コーナー以降に好位置にいると\\n速度を上げゴールまで遠い場合最高の\\:
<size=22>Increase speed when in a good position from the 
last corner in the Final Leg on. If the finish 
is still far, also lightly increase acceleration 
to top off your awesome run
</size>
text.スタート後からレース後半まで\\n好位置を維持し続けるとレース中盤に\\n勝利へ:
<size=22>Maintain a good position until the latter race 
half to pick your path to victory in the Middle 
Leg, increasing speed
</size>
text.最終コーナーで前の方で抜くと速度が\\n後ろの方で抜くと加速力が上がる: <size=22>On last corner, gain speed when passing in front \nor acceleration when passing in back\n</size>
text.中盤のコーナーで先団を走行中\\n後ろに他ウマ娘を検知すると\\nわずかに息を入:
<size=22>When running in front of the pack during 
a Middle Leg corner and you detect 
a horsegirl behind, take a small breath 
and increase your speed
</size>
text.レース中盤を好位置で走行中に\\n詰め寄られると前方のウマ娘から\\n持久力を吸: <size=22>When chased in a good position during Middle \nLeg, drain energy from the horsegirls ahead\n</size>
text.終盤コーナーで後方で詰寄ると最終直線\\nで速度が上がる、終盤コーナーで追い抜\:
<size=22>Increase speed on the final straight when 
closing in from the back on a final leg corner. 
Effect increases with number of overtakes 
on said corner
</size>
text.ラストスパートの最終直線に中団以降で\\n速度を少しずつ上げ、効果中スキルを\\:
<size=22>Gradually increase speed when in the midfield or further back on the Final Spurt's 
last straight (Increase effect up to 3x when 
activating skills during the effect period)
</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に3回追い抜くと\\n抱いた誇りを力に変えて\\n最終直線で速度:
<size=22>When overtaking thrice from the final corner on, 
turn your cherished pride into power, 
continually speeding up on the final straight.
</size>
text.残り350mを切って\\n前の方で後ろのウマ娘との距離が近いと\\n譲らぬ思いで:
<size=22>Your never-die attitude makes it easier to slip 
away when near the front, and the girl behind is 
close with 350m to go
</size>
text.最終コーナー走行中に中団で競り合うと\\n抜け出しやすくなる:
<size=22>If you're blocked in the middle of 
the pack at the final corner, it 
will become easier to get out
</size>
text.最終直線を好位置で走行中\\n前のウマ娘との距離が近いと\\n抜け出しやすくなる:
<size=22>If you're in front after the final corner and 
about to overtake another girl, your speed and 
acceleration will increase
</size>
text.レース中間付近で先頭付近だと速度が\\n少しずつ上がる、ダートレースでは\\nさ:
<size=22>Increase speed gradually when approaching 
Middle Leg and closing in on the lead. 
Also recover energy slightly on Dirt
</size>
text.レース終盤で最終直線が迫ったとき\\n高みを目指して中団から速度を上げる:
<size=22>Increase speed, aiming for greater heights, 
from the midfield when the final straight 
is coming up in the Final Leg
</size>
text.最終コーナーで先頭から離されていると\\nその距離が遠いほど頑張り続けて\\n速:
<size=22>When away from the front at the last corner, 
gradually increase your speed, persisting longer 
the further away you are
</size>
text.レース後半に後方で詰め寄られると\\nマシマシの幸運パワーが身体に実り\\n速度:
<size=22>In the second part of the race, increase speed 
when someone is drawing closer to you in the 
back of the pack
</size>
text.最終直線に入ったとき前の方だと速度を\\n上げ、前2人後ろ2人までの\\nウマ娘:
<size=22>Increase speed and tire out the 2 girls 
behind and ahead of you when entering 
the final straight in the leading group
</size>
text.終盤目前の下り坂で中団に控えていて\\nゴールまで遠いとレースを\\n思いっきり:
<size=22>Get really into the race and increase speed 
when holding steady in the mid-pack on 
a downhill right before the Final Leg and 
the finish line is still far.
</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に追い抜いていた場合\\n最終直線で中団から速度を上げる\\n人:
<size=22>Increase speed from the middle pack on 
the final straight, having made a pass 
from the final corner on. Spur yourself 
on longer when not popular
</size>
text.レース前半、掛からず最後方付近に\\n控え続けていると、最終直線で\\n気合を爆:
<size=22>Flare your spirit to increase acceleration on 
the final straight, having kept your cool in the 
trailing group during the race's first half
</size>
text.終盤最終コーナーでスキルを発動すると\\n声援を胸に速度を少し上げる\\n中山レ:
<size=22>Speed increases slightly, or a lot when at 
Nakayama Racecourse, turning the cheers into 
power when activating a skill in the final 
corner during Final Leg.
</size>
text.レース後半に先団にいると残りの\\n持久力に応じたロングスパートをかけて\\n速:
<size=22>Continuously increase speed lightly through a 
long spurt, based on remaining stamina, when 
in the leading group after half race distance.
</size>

text.レース終盤にアオハル魂が燃え\\nレース中のチームメンバーの根性合計が\\n高い: <size=22>Increase speed & accel during the Final Leg \nbased on total team member guts\n</size>
<size=22>Increase speed & accel during the Final Leg \nbased on total team member guts\n</size>
text.レース序盤にアオハル魂が燃えしばらく\\nレース中のチームメンバーの賢さ合計が\:
<size=22>Flare your Aoharu Spirit in the Opening 
Leg, running fixedly ahead based on 
total team member wisdom
</size>

<size=22>Flare your Aoharu Spirit in the Opening 
Leg, running slightly ahead based 
on total team member wisdom
</size>
text.レース後半に呼吸を整え前へ踏み込む\\n育成で重ねた勝利の数だけ効果が高まる:
<size=22>Catch your breath and break ahead in the race's 
Latter Half. Effect in training increases with 
number of wins
</size>
text.レース後半に\\nちょっと呼吸を整え前へ踏み込む\\n育成で重ねた勝利の数だけ効:
<size=22>Catch your breath a little and break ahead in 
the race's Latter Half. Effect in training 
increases with number of wins
</size>
text.レース後半に前の方だと速度が上がり\\nさらに加速力がわずかに上がる\\nファン:
<size=22>Increase speed when near the front 
in the race's latter half. 
Also increase acceleration slightly. 
Effect increases with number of fans
</size>
text.レース後半に前の方だと速度がわずかに\\n上がり、加速力がほんのわずかに上がる\:
<size=22>Increase speed slightly when near the front 
in the race's latter half. 
Also increase acceleration very slightly. 
Effect increases with number of fans
</size>
text.レース終盤が迫ったとき\\n速度がわずかに上がる: <size=22>Slightly increase speed when \nnearing the final leg\n</size>
text.ラストスパートで持久力を少し使い\\n速度が少し上がる: <size=22>Slightly increase speed by expending \nsome energy during the last spurt\n</size>
text.ラストスパートで追い越そうとすると\\nしばらくの間速度がわずかに上がる: <size=22>Slightly increase speed for a while when \nattempting to overtake in the last spurt\n</size>
text.レース後半にスキルを2回発動させると\\n速度がわずかに上がる: <size=22>Slightly increase speed when activating \n2 skills in the race's latter half\n</size>
text.やる気が好調か絶好調だと\\nスタミナ、根性、賢さが\\n少し上がる場合がある: <size=22>Chance to slightly increase stamina, guts, and \nwisdom when motivation is high or peaking\n</size>
text.レースへの渇望により\\n能力が少し発揮しやすくなる: <size=22>Use your craving to race to demonstrate your \nabilities a little better\n</size>
text.かつての走りとは違うがあの頃と\\n変わらない想いが能力をすごく上げる:
<size=22>Remembering the slightly different yet 
unchanging running of the past, raise your 
ability greatly
</size>
text.見たい景色を必死に追いかけ\\n能力が少し発揮しやすくなる: <size=22>Frantically chasing a dream, you become faster\n</size>
text.トレーナーの恐れが伝播し\\n能力が少し発揮しにくくなる: <size=22>Influenced by your trainer's \nfear, you become slower\n</size>
text.トレーナーの恐れがより鮮明になり\\nレース後半のコーナーで\\n速度がすごく下: <size=22>Afflicted by your trainer's fear, you slow \nsignificantly on a Final Leg corner\n</size>
text.みんなの想いと共に\\nゴールを走り抜ける気持ちを強く持つと\\n最終直線で速度: <size=22>Holding a strong desire to finish with everyone, \nyour speed increases on the final straight\n</size>
text.次のステージを見せてくれる\\n期待を伝えてサイレンススズカの\\n能力を少し発: <size=22>In hopes of seeing what lies beyond, Silence \nSuzuka's ability is increased\n</size>
text.気持ちよく走れるおまじないをして\\nサイレンススズカの能力を\\n少し発揮しや: <size=22>Under a comfortable running spell, Silence \nSuzuka's ability is increased\n</size>
text.自分だけの走りを見つけた\\n親友への激励がサイレンススズカの\\n能力を少し発:
<size=22>Having found her own running ways, Silence 
Suzuka's ability is slightly increased in 
encouragement of her bosom friend
</size>
text.レース後半のコーナーで思いっきりの\\n応援が届くとサイレンススズカの\\n持久: <size=22>Hearing shouts of support in the latter half, \nSilence Suzuka recovers HP\n</size>
text.日本一のウマ娘に\\n一歩近づけた手ごたえにより\\n能力が少し発揮しやすくなる:
<size=22>Feeling one step closer to being the #1 
horsegirl in Japan, displaying your abilities 
becomes a little easier
</size>
text.チーム全員が思い入れのあるレースを\\n絶対に勝ちたいという気持ちにより\\n能:
<size=22>The desire to win a race that everyone on the 
team has a passion for makes it much easier to 
demonstrate your abilities
</size>
text.全身全霊、ぶつけます！: <size=22>I'ma hit em with all I got!\n</size>
text.レース終盤に前の方で相手を抜くと\\n速度がわずかに上がり\\nさらに加速力がほ:
<size=22>Increase speed slightly, and acceleration very 
slightly when overtaking in the front group 
during Final Leg
</size>
text.レース後半に差を付けて先頭にいると\\n速度をわずかに上げる: <size=22>Slightly increase speed if you lead with a \nmargin in Final Leg\n</size>
text.最終直線で前と差が詰まると\\n速度が少し上がる: <size=22>Lightly increase speed when closing down the \nleader on the final straight\n</size>
text.最終コーナー以降で前の方にいると\\n加速力がわずかに上がる: <size=22>Slightly increase acceleration from final corner \nonward when leading\n</size>
text.最終直線で前の方で少し抜け出ていると\\n速度が少し上がる:
<size=22>If you're in front at the final straight 
and manage to break out a little, 
increase speed a little
</size>
text.残り200m地点で前の方にいると\\n少し抜け出しやすくなる: <size=22>If you're in the front when there's 200m \nremaining, passing becomes a bit easier\n</size>
text.レース中間からロングスパートをかけて\\n速度がちょっとずつ上がる: <size=22>From the middle of the race very slightly \nincrease your speed by running a long spurt\n</size>
text.残り200mを切って前の方にいると\\n速度がわずかに上がる: <size=22>Slightly increase speed when close \nto the lead in last 200m\n</size>
text.レース後半に前の方で\\n1番になる力をちょっと発揮する: <size=22>Display a bit of your ability to take 1st place \nduring the latter half of the race\n</size>
text.最終直線が迫ったとき好位置にいると\\n弾みを付けて加速力がわずかに上がる:
<size=22>Carry momentum and slightly increase 
acceleration when approaching the final straight 
in a good position
</size>
text.最終直線で後ろの方から追い抜くと\\n速度がわずかに上がる: <size=22>Your speed increases slightly when passing \nduring the last straight\n</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に後ろの方から\\n外を回って追い抜いていると\\n最終直線で速:
<size=22>Slightly increase speed on final straight 
when you made an outside pass in or 
after the final corner
</size>
text.最終コーナーで前の方にいると\\n速度がわずかに上がる: <size=22>Slightly increase speed if you're at the front \nafter the last corner\n</size>
text.最終直線で余力を持って前にいると\\nちょっと優位を保ちやすくなる:
<size=22>If you're in front during the last 
straight with spare energy, it becomes 
easier to keep a good position
</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に前の方で\\n前または後ろのウマ娘と距離が近いと\\n速度がわ: <size=22>Slightly increase speed in or after the final \ncorner when a horsegirl is close ahead or behind\n</size>
text.最終コーナー以降で外から追い抜くと\\n速度をわずかに上げる\\n中盤競り合って:
<size=22>Slightly increase speed when passing from 
outside in or after the final corner, more so 
after battling in the Middle Leg
</size>
text.レース終盤に3回追い抜くと\\n最終直線で速度が少し上がる: <size=22>Overtake 3 times in Final Leg to lightly \nincrease speed in the final straight\n</size>
text.最終コーナーで中団以降から追い抜くと\\n速度がわずかに上がる: <size=22>Slightly increase speed in the final corner when \npassing from the midfield or lower\n</size>
text.レース終盤に2回追い抜くと\\n速度をわずかに上げ\\nコース取りがわずかにうま: <size=22>Slightly increase speed and positioning when \npassing twice in the Final Leg\n</size>
text.レース終盤のコーナーで先頭にいると\\n加速力をわずかに上げる: <size=22>On last corner, slightly gain acceleration when \nin the first position\n</size>
text.レース後半の直線で好位置にいる\\nまたは中団から前を狙うと\\nわずかに駆けて:
<size=22>Increase speed slightly on a straight in the 
latter half when in a good position or moving up 
from the middle of the pack
</size>
text.レース後半に好位置で競り合うと\\n速度をわずかに上げる: <size=22>Competing for a good position in the race's \nlatter half increases your speed\n</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に前の方で追い抜くと\\n速度をわずかに上げる: <size=22>Slightly increase speed when passing in the \nfront group in or after the final corner\n</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に前の方で競り合うと\\n直線でちょっと抜け出しやすくなる: <size=22>Break out a little easier in the final straight \nafter battling in or after the final corner\n</size>
text.レース後半に中団から\\n速度をちょっとずつ上げ前方のウマ娘を\\nほんのちょっ:
<size=22>In the race's second half, gradually increase 
speed and slightly slow girls ahead from the 
middle of the pack.
</size>
text.最終直線までみずから崩れることなく\\n前の方にいるとわずかに速度が上がる: <size=22>Lead without letting up until final straight to \nincrease your speed slightly\n</size>
text.レース終盤のコーナーで前の位置に\\nつこうとして加速力がわずかに上がる:
<size=22>Your acceleration increases slightly 
while keeping a good position during 
the Final Leg's corners
</size>
text.レース中間に好位置で少し疲れてくると\\nちょっと前へ踏み込む:
<size=22>If you get a little tired while being in a good 
position in the middle of the race, your speed 
and acceleration increase slightly
</size>
text.残り300mを切って先頭もしくは\\n前の方で先頭のウマ娘との距離が近いと\\n: <size=22>Increase speed slightly when leading or \nclose to the leading horsegirl with 300m to go\n</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に追い抜いて\\n先団についていると最終直線で\\n速度がわずか:
<size=22>Slightly increase speed on the final straight 
when making a pass in the leading group in or 
after the final corner
</size>
text.残り300m付近で前の方だと速度を\\nちょっと上げる、ちょうど坂を上り\\nき:
<size=22>Increase speed a little when in the leading 
places with around 300m to go, slightly more so 
after just climbing a hill
</size>
text.レース後半のコーナーで控えていると\\n持久力をわずかに回復し\\nさらに少しの:
<size=22>Recover a bit of energy and slightly increase 
speed for a while when holding steady in a 
latter race half corner
</size>
text.最終直線で先頭から離されていると\\n速度がわずかに上がる\\n最後方付近にいる:
<size=22>When far from the front on the final 
straight, increase speed slightly. More 
so if all the way near the back
</size>
text.レース前半、中団以降に控え続けると\\n追い比べをしたとき、速度を少し上げる:
<size=22>Greatly increase speed when in Showdown if 
you've restrained yourself in the mid pack or 
further back during the first race half.
</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に競り合っていると\\n最終直線で前方にいる時\\n速度がわずか:
<size=22>Slightly increase speed when in the lead group 
on the final straight after battling in or after 
the final corner
</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に中団の内ラチ側に\\nいると最終直線で速度がわずかに上がり\\:
<size=22>Slightly increase speed and lightly improve 
course-taking ability when close to the inner 
railing in the midfield from the last corner on.
</size>
text.最終直線まで冷静に自身の計画通り\\n走行出来れば、先頭目がけて\\n速度をわず:
<size=22>If you manage to keep your composure 
until the final straight, your speed 
will increase slightly
</size>
text.レース中間付近で好位置にいる時に\\n追い抜くとちょっと進出を開始する: <size=22>Gain slight momentum while in a good position \nwhen passing someone in the Middle Leg\n</size>
text.最終直線を走行中に競り合うと\\n速度をわずかに上げる: <size=22>Slightly increase speed when competing on the \nfinal straight\n</size>
text.レース後半に中団から仕掛け始める時に\\n加速力をちょっとずつ上げる:
<size=22>In the race's second half, increase acceleration 
very slightly if you start overtaking from the 
middle of the pack
</size>
text.レース後半に前の方で競り合うと\\n速度がわずかに上がる: <size=22>Your speed increases slightly on the later half \nof the race when in front competing for the lead\n</size>
text.残り200ｍ地点で先頭ではないとき\\n先頭の4バ身以内で速度をわずかに上げ\\:
<size=22>Increase speed a tiny bit when not leading and 
within 4 lengths from the lead with 200m to go. 
Increase slightly if within 2 lengths
</size>
text.最終コーナー突入時まで冷静に後方で\\n控えていると残り300m地点から\\n速:
<size=22>Continually increase speed at 300m to go if 
you've restrained yourself calmly in the back 
until the final corner rush
</size>
text.レース中盤で好位置にいる時に\\n持久力が少し回復する: <size=22>Slightly recover energy when in a good position \nduring the Middle Leg\n</size>
text.レース中盤の直線で前の方にいるとき\\n後ろのウマ娘と距離が近いと\\n譲らない:
<size=22>Turn your refusal to yield into strength 
when your lead's about to be taken 
during the Middle Leg
</size>
text.最終直線を走行中に好位置で\\n追い抜くまたは詰め寄られると\\nわずかに速度を:
<size=22>If you overtake or are about to be overtaken on 
the final straight while in a good position, 
your speed will increase slightly
</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に追い抜こうとすると\\n残り400ｍ以降に好位置で速度がわずか:
<size=22>Increase speed slightly when in a good position 
with 400m to go after attempting an overtake 
in or after the final corner. Further increased 
speed when popularity is low.
</size>
text.最終コーナー以降で中団から\\n前へ出る時、速度がわずかに上がる: <size=22>Slightly increase speed in or after the last \ncorner when coming up from the back of the pack\n</size>
text.レース中盤のコーナーで競り合っていた\\n場合、終盤かつ最終コーナー半ば以降に\:
<size=22>Increase acceleration slightly when in a good 
position from the 2nd half of a Final Leg Corner 
on, and having battled in a Mid Leg Corner
</size>
text.最終コーナーで後ろの方にいると近くの\\nウマ娘を見て持久力をわずかに回復する: <size=22>If you're in the back during the last corner, \nyour endurance recovers slightly\n</size>
text.終盤最終コーナー以降に後方から迫ると\\n短い間加速力がほんのちょっと上がり\\:
<size=22>Very slightly increase acceleration for 
a short time, increasing strength and 
duration up to 3 times with each overtake, 
when closing in from the rear at or after 
the last corner in Final Leg.
</size>
text.レース終盤に前方が詰まると\\nお告げ次第で道をわずかに切り開く: <size=22>Slightly easier to find an opening if blocked at \nthe front in Final Leg\n</size>
text.レース終盤のコーナーで\\n中団以降のポジションから追い抜くと\\nちょっと前を:
<size=22>During the Last Leg, if you overtake from 
outside the front of the pack during a corner, 
aim to move a little further forwards
</size>
text.落ち着いたまま、中盤の仕掛けどころの\\nまたは終盤の勝負どころのコーナーを\\:
<size=22>Having kept your calm in the middle of the pack, 
acceleration will increase slightly during the 
decisive Middle or Final Leg corner
</size>
text.レース終盤で3番手の時に負けそうに\\nなると速度がわずかに上がる: <size=22>When you're in 3rd place at the end of the race \nand about to lose, your speed slightly increases\n</size>
text.レースを冷静に運ぶことができると残り\\n200mで実力発揮、速度が少し上がる: <size=22>After proceeding through the race calmly, your \nspeed increases a little during the last 200m\n</size>
text.レース中間付近で中団にいるとき\\n持久力をわずかに回復し\\nさらに速度をちょ: <size=22>Slightly increase speed and recover a bit of \nenergy when in the midfield around mid distance\n</size>
text.スタート後からレース後半まで前の方を\\nキープすると持久力をわずかに回復し\\:
<size=22>A rush of emotions slightly recover energy and 
gradually increase speed very slightly when 
staying in the front group for the entire first 
half of the race
</size>
text.最終直線に入ったとき好位置につけて\\nいると速度がわずかに上がる\\n先頭が近:
<size=22>Increase speed slightly when entering 
the final straight in a good position, 
more so when near the lead
</size>
text.前方にいるとき、レース後半の第3コー\\nナーで速度をちょっと上げる、または\\:
<size=22>Increase speed a little when in the lead 
group in the third corner after half distance, 
or push forwards on the track's back straight 
during the Final Leg
</size>
text.残り300mを切って好位置にいるとき\\n前のウマ娘との距離が近いと\\n速度が:
<size=22>Increase speed slightly when in a 
good position close to the girl ahead 
with less than 300m to go
</size>
text.最終直線で後ろのウマ娘と距離が近いと\\n持久力をわずかに使い\\n少しの間速度:
<size=22>When the horsegirl behind is close on the final 
straight, increase your speed for a short while 
at the cost of a tiny bit of stamina
</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に追い抜いていた場合\\n残り300mを切って先団にいるとき\\:
<size=22>Increase speed slightly when in the leading 
group with 300m to go, having made a pass from 
the Final Corner on
</size>
text.レース後半に中団から残り持久力に\\n応じたロングスパートをかけて\\n速度をほ:
<size=22>Start a long spurt based on remaining energy 
from the midfield in the race's latter half, 
continuously increasing speed a tiny amount
</size>
text.レース前半で控え、最終コーナー後半に\\n前の方だと長時間加速力をほんのちょっ\:
<size=22>Slightly increase acceleration for an extended 
duration when near the front in the latter half 
of the final corner after having sat back a little 
during the first half of the race. 
Stronger effect when in 2nd place
</size>
text.残り400mを切って\\n前の方で詰め寄られると\\nちょっと抜け出しやすくなる: <size=22>Break away more easily when chased down \nin or near the lead with 400m to go\n</size>
text.終盤が迫ったときどこかで\\n速度をちょっと上げる: <size=22>Increase speed slightly at some point when \nnearing Final Leg\n</size>
text.残り300m地点で前の方にいると速度を\\nちょっと上げる、ダートレースで先頭の:
<size=22>Increase speed very slightly when near the 
front at 300m to the line. Push a little bit 
further ahead when close to the leader on dirt
</size>
text.中盤で2回スキルを使うと\\n持久力がわずかに回復する: <size=22>Restore endurance slightly if you activate two \nskills in the middle part of the race\n</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に\\n前の方で追いすがっていると\\n最終直線を走行中速度が少:
<size=22>Slightly increase speed on the last straight 
when chasing someone close to the lead in or 
after the final corner
</size>
text.スキルで持久力を回復すると\\nレース後半で前のほうにいる時に\\nわずかに速度:
<size=22>In the race's second half, increase speed 
slightly when recovering endurance with skills 
while in front
</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に先団で追い抜くと\\n少しの間速度が少し上がる: <size=22>Increase speed for a short while when overtaking \nin the midfield from the final corner on\n</size>
text.スキルで持久力を3回以上回復すると\\nレース後半で勝利に向かい\\nちょっと呼: <size=22>After recovering HP with skills thrice, take a \nbreath and break for victory\n</size>
text.レース後半に速度をほんのわずかに上げ\\nさらに使用可能なレアスキルを1つ\\n: <size=22>Activate 1 available rare skill somewhere in the \nsecond half of the race, no questions asked.\n</size>
text.残り200m地点で前の方にいると速度を\\nわずかに上げる、さらに先頭のウマ娘と:
<size=22>Increase speed when near the lead with 200m to 
go, additionally pushing further forwards when 
close to the leading horsegirl
</size>
text.中盤に後ろの方で順位を下げた時に\\n持久力を少し回復する: <size=22>Slightly recover energy when when your order \ndrops in the trailing pack during Middle Leg\n</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に前めで力が尽きかけ\\n詰め寄られると速度をわずかに上げ続ける:
<size=22>Continuously increase speed slightly in or after 
the last corner when being pressed in the lead 
group and stamina is running out
</size>
text.最終コーナーで中団から前を狙う時\\n加速力をわずかに上げる: <size=22>On last corner, slightly gain acceleration when \naiming for the lead from the middle pack\n</size>
text.残り400m地点で先団だと少しの間\\n速度をわずかに上げる、それまでに7回\\:
<size=22>Increase speed slightly when heading 
the mid pack a little, moderately 
so if you've used 7 skills
</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に先団で\\n詰め寄られるとわずかに速度を上げる:
<size=22>If you're about to be overtaken at 
the front after the final corner, your 
speed will increase slightly
</size>
text.レース中盤で前の方から\\n仕掛け始める時に速度がわずかに上がる: <size=22>Slightly increase speed in Middle Leg when \novertaking someone close to lead\n</size>
text.終盤の直線で前の方にいると速度を\\nわずかに上げる、そこが向正面の場合\\nさ:
<size=22>Slightly increase speed when leading on a Final 
Leg straight, also increase acceleration very 
slightly when on the back straight of the track
</size>
text.終盤最終コーナー以降に好位置にいると\\n速度をわずかに上げゴールまで遠い場合\:
<size=22>Increase speed slightly when in a good position 
from the last corner in the Final Leg on. If the 
finish is still far, also very lightly increase 
acceleration to top off your awesome run
</size>
text.スタート後からレース後半まで\\n好位置を維持し続けると\\nレース中盤に速度を:
<size=22>Maintain a good position until the 
latter race half to increase speed 
slightly in the Middle Leg
</size>
text.最終コーナーで前の方で抜くと速度が後\\nろの方で抜くと加速力がわずかに上がる: <size=22>On last corner, slightly gain speed when passing \nin front or acceleration when passing in back\n</size>
text.中盤のコーナーで先団を走行中\\n後ろに他ウマ娘がいるとほんのわずかに\\n息を:
<size=22>When running in front of the pack during 
a Middle Leg corner with another horsegirl 
behind, take a tiny breath and increase 
your speed slightly
</size>
text.レース中盤を好位置で走行中に\\n詰め寄られると前方のウマ娘から\\n持久力をわ: <size=22>Drain a bit of energy from girls in front when \napproaching the Middle Leg in a good position\n</size>
text.ラストスパートの最終直線に中団以降で\\n速度をちょっとずつ上げ、効果中スキル\:
<size=22>Gradually increase speed slightly when in the 
midfield or further back on the Final Spurt's 
last straight (Increase effect up to 3x when 
activating skills during the effect period)
</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に3回追い抜くと\\n最終直線で速度をわずかに上げ続ける:
<size=22>When overtaking thrice from the final 
corner on, continually speed up slightly 
on the final straight.
</size>
text.残り350mを切って\\n前の方で後ろのウマ娘との距離が近いと\\nちょっと抜け:
<size=22>It becomes a little easier to slip away when 
near the front, and the girl behind is close 
with 350m to go
</size>
text.最終コーナー走行中に中団で競り合うと\\nちょっと抜け出しやすくなる:
<size=22>If you're blocked in the middle of the 
pack at the final corner, it will become 
a little easier to get out
</size>
text.最終直線を好位置で走行中\\n前のウマ娘との距離が近いと\\nちょっと抜け出しや:
<size=22>If you're in front after the final corner and 
about to overtake another girl, your speed and 
acceleration will increase slightly
</size>
text.レース中間付近で先頭付近だと速度が\\nちょっとずつ上がる、ダートレースでは\\:
<size=22>Increase speed slightly & gradually 
when approaching Middle Leg and 
closing in on the lead. 
Also recover energy very slightly on Dirt
</size>
text.レース終盤で最終直線が迫ったとき\\n中団から速度をわずかに上げる: <size=22>Increase speed from the midfield when \nthe final straight is coming up in Final Leg\n</size>
text.最終コーナーで先頭から離されていると\\nその距離が遠いほど頑張り続けて\\n速:
<size=22>When away from the front at the last corner, 
gradually increase your speed slightly, 
persisting longer the further away you are
</size>
text.レース後半に後方で詰め寄られると\\n幸運パワーが身体に実り\\n速度がわずかに: <size=22>Increase speed slightly when chasing the back of \nthe pack in the Final Leg\n</size>
text.終盤目前の下り坂で中団に控えていて\\nゴールまで遠いと\\n速度をわずかに上げ:
<size=22>Increase speed slightly when holding steady in 
the mid-pack on a downhill right before the 
Final Leg and the finish line is still far.
</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に追い抜いていた場合\\n最終直線中団から速度をわずかに上げる\:
<size=22>Increase speed slightly from the middle pack on 
the final straight, having made a pass from the 
final corner on. Spur yourself on a little 
longer when not popular
</size>
text.レース前半、掛からず最後方付近に\\n控え続けていると、最終直線で\\n加速力が:
<size=22>Increase acceleration slightly on the final 
straight, having kept your cool in the trailing 
group during the race's first half
</size>
text.終盤最終コーナーでスキルを発動すると\\n速度をちょっと上げる\\n中山レース場:
<size=22>Speed increases a little, or mildly when at 
Nakayama Racecourse when activating a skill in 
the final corner during Final Leg.
</size>
text.レース後半に先団にいると残りの\\n持久力に応じたロングスパートをかけて\\n速:
<size=22>Continuously increase speed very lightly through a 
long spurt, based on remaining stamina, when in 
the leading group after half race distance.
</size>
text.レーシングカーニバルで獲得するカーニ\\nバルptにボーナスが付く（＋{0}％）:
<size=22>Confers a bonus to pts obtained in Racing 
Carnival (+{0}%). This skill will disappear 
after the event.
</size>
text.レーシングカーニバルで基礎能力+{0}\\n％、さらに{1}％の確率で絶好調にな:
<size=22>Increase stats in Racing Carnival by +{0}%, and 
have a {1}% chance to max your mood. This skill 
will disappear after the event.
</size>
text.スタートがすごく苦手になり出遅れたり\\nスタート時の加速力が低下したりする\\:
<size=22>Makes the start of the race very difficult and 
lowers your acceleration tremendously. This 
skill will disappear after training.
</size>
text.芝・中距離レースが得意になる\\nこのスキルはイベント専用になります: <size=22>Turf・Become better at Medium races \nThis skill is exclusively for the event.\n</size>
text.芝・長距離レースが得意になる\\nこのスキルはイベント専用になります: <size=22>Turf・Become better at Long races \nThis skill is exclusively for the event.\n</size>
text.芝・マイルレースが得意になる\\nこのスキルはイベント専用になります: <size=22>Turf・Become better at Mile races \nThis skill is exclusively for the event.\n</size>
text.芝・短距離レースが得意になる\\nこのスキルはイベント専用になります: <size=22>Turf・Become better at Short races \nThis skill is exclusively for the event.\n</size>
text.ダート・中距離レースが得意になる\\nこのスキルはイベント専用になります: <size=22>Dirt・Become better at Medium races \nThis skill is exclusively for the event.\n</size>
